name: Machu Picchu & The Putucusi Trek
description: Travel to the Inca kingdom by train and enjoy one of the most spectaculars rides of the world. This great program takes you to visit the Sanctuary of Machu Picchu and also involves a fantastic short trek to one of the sacred mountains of the Incas. On our first day we take you to visit the impressive Putucusi Mountain, a sacred place where it is said the Incas performed ceremonies and religious rituals. At the top of Putucusi you will be rewarded by an amazing view of Machu Picchu, as well as the great natural scenery around, featuring giant mountains covered by lush vegetation, all within a mysterious atmosphere. On our second day we visit Machu Picchu by sunrise with our local guide. So this is another great way to visit the 7 new wonder of our planet.
